stance_1: I am concerned about environmental impact
justification: The interviewee explicitly states that environmental concern is a motivation for including more plant-based meals.

stance_1: I am concerned about environmental impact
stance_2: I make gradual and flexible changes
justification: The interviewee explicitly links environmental concern to making gradual, mindful changes.

stance_1: I am motivated by health reasons
justification: The interviewee directly states that health reasons motivate eating more plant-based meals.

stance_1: I am motivated by health reasons
stance_2: I make gradual and flexible changes
justification: The gradual and flexible changes are driven in part by health motivations, as stated in the interview.

stance_1: I eat meat a few times a week
justification: Eating meat only a few times a week is explicitly linked to including more plant-based meals.

stance_1: I eat meat a few times a week
stance_2: I make gradual and flexible changes
justification: The interviewee describes their reduction in meat as a gradual and flexible process.

stance_2: I make gradual and flexible changes
justification: The increase in plant-based meals is described as part of a gradual and flexible change.

stance_2: Meals at gatherings include more plant-based dishes
justification: Personal increase in plant-based meals is reflected in group meal choices.

stance_1: I make gradual and flexible changes
stance_2: Meals at gatherings include more plant-based dishes
justification: The group’s shift to more plant-based meals at gatherings is described as gradual and flexible.

stance_1: Meals at gatherings include more plant-based dishes
stance_2: We sometimes miss usual meat dishes
justification: Including more plant-based dishes leads to missing usual meat dishes, as explicitly stated.

stance_1: My social circle tries to eat less meat
stance_2: Social contacts are motivated by environmental concerns
justification: Environmental concerns are an explicit motivation for the social circle eating less meat.

stance_1: My social circle tries to eat less meat
stance_2: Social contacts are motivated by ethical reasons
justification: Ethical reasons are stated as a motivation for reducing meat consumption in the social group.

stance_1: My social circle tries to eat less meat
stance_2: Social contacts are motivated by health
justification: Health motivations are explicitly stated as driving the group's effort to eat less meat.

stance_1: Meals at gatherings include more plant-based dishes

justification: The group’s effort to eat less meat is reflected in the meals chosen at gatherings.

stance_1: Meals at gatherings include more plant-based dishes

justification: The inclusion of more plant-based dishes at gatherings is supported by environmental motivations in the group.

stance_1: Meals at gatherings include more plant-based dishes
stance_2: Social contacts are motivated by ethical reasons
justification: Ethical motivations in the group support the inclusion of more plant-based dishes at gatherings.

stance_1: Meals at gatherings include more plant-based dishes
